name: Seal sports
description:
The hottest game these days is Seal toss! The goal's simple: throw your Seal friend in the water in as few steps as possible!

Whew, I really didn't have much time to complete this one, mostly because I started playing  minecraft again, oops!
I really wish I had time for some level design, and to fix the issue with walls...

Amazing music by Jonathan Bretheau
